title: France panorama. [No. 70/01?]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The launching of “Le Terrible” French nuclear submarine. 2. The artists’ home. 3. Years of loneliness. 4. Books for Christmas. 5. Christmas in the Rock of Ages.
